articles.title: Predictive modeling with text using tidy data principles
articles.contents:
Welcome
These are the materials for the R/Pharma workshop Predictive modeling with text using tidy data principles, by Emil Hvitfeldt. In this workshop will you learn:
Basics of text mining with tidytext
The effect of text preprocessing
How to fit a predictive model in tidymodels
Use textrecipes to construct features form text
Links
Link to this website: https://textmodels.netlify.app/
Link to Supervised Machine Learning for Text Analysis in R book: https://smltar.com/
Link to Text Mining with R book: https://www.tidytextmining.com/
Acknowledgments
This is website made with the distill package.
